docs.abstract: Charles M Blow Op-Ed column contends Hillary Clinton ran very strong presidential campaign in month of June, particularly in comparison to Donald Trump; notes several gaffes on Trump's part and incidents that have allowed Clinton to improve her image.

docs.snippet: A post by Mr. Trump involving Star of David imagery and Hillary Clinton was traced to a message board known for anti-Semitism and white supremacy....
docs.lead_paragraph: A post by Mr. Trump involving Star of David imagery and Hillary Clinton was traced to a message board known for anti-Semitism and white supremacy.
docs.abstract: News website Mic traces Star of David imagery used in controversial Twitter posting by Donald J Trump to organization associated with white nationalism; posting, which shows Trump's political opponent Hillary Clinton standing next to symbol with caption Most Corrupt Candidate Ever! caused charges of anti-Semitism.

headline.main: Donald Trump’s Star of David Tweet Came From a Fringe Website, a Report Says
headline.print_headline: Report Traces Trump’s Star of David Posting

docs.abstract: Denis McDonough, Pres Obama's chief of staff, announces prohibition against members of Pres Obama's cabinet addressing Democratic National Convention; says move was needed in order to clearly separate it from Hillary Clinton's presidential campaign.
